title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Instructional Design (ID) Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Mathematics Curriculum Knowledge and Basic Instructional Design Concepts
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive mobile learning environment for in-company elementary school teachers to strengthen mathematics education design capabilities. Emphasizes personalized device use and collaborative learning based on behavioral research

learning_goals: Learners can identify and select at least three instructional design models appropriate for actual mathematics classroom contexts
Learners can share instructional design solutions with peer teachers using collaboration tools in mobile environments
Learners can evaluate and improve their instructional design processes at least once by applying action research methodologies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
